languages.text: "Пусть покажут, чего стоят их слова и учение".
"Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."
languages.original_text: "Пусть покажут, чего стоят их слова и учение".

traits.locale_text: "Let them show the worth of their words and teachings."
"Let them show the worth of their words and teachings."
"Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."
"Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."
"Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."
"Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

languages.text: “让他们展示一下话语和教诲的力量吧。”
languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

traits.locale_text: “让他们展示一下话语和教诲的力量吧。”

languages.text: «Que muestren el valor de sus palabras y enseñanzas».
languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

traits.locale_text: «Que muestren el valor de sus palabras y enseñanzas».

languages.text: 「彼らに、自分たちの言葉と教えの重みを示すように促そう」
languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

traits.locale_text: 「彼らに、自分たちの言葉と教えの重みを示すように促そう」

languages.text: « Laissons-les démontrer le bien-fondé de leurs discours et de leurs enseignements. »
languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

traits.locale_text: « Laissons-les démontrer le bien-fondé de leurs discours et de leurs enseignements. »

languages.text: "Lasst sie das Gewicht ihrer Worte und Lehren zeigen."
languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."

traits.locale_text: "Lasst sie das Gewicht ihrer Worte und Lehren zeigen."

languages.original_text: "Let them show the weight of their words and teachings."
